messages.message:
After kandji upgrade and mac os upgrade, everytime I start IB locally, I have to manually click on Allow for ~ 7 popups.
Has anyone found a workaround for this?
Can you file a ticket with IT for this? They’re should’ve opened up a bunch of the ports we need already, so if there’s some more configuration updates needed, we need to let them know.
I joined with the macs already installed with Kandji and have been doing this for a while now, would love a workaround!
Just sent an email to callonme
So to quickly note this is OS level, so there is something going on here independent of Kandji or Zscaler

Kandji is requiring the local system firewall be enabled but it’s not pushing any rules or requirements to it, the is potentially a case of just needing to accept it in the Sec and Privacy pane as it notes (possibly something you removed without realizing it?)
Either way, good call putting in the ticket, we can dig in with on the details
